venue.name: Fire Warden's Tr trailhead Parking Lot

item.description:
I'm planning to visit Maine for multiple day hikes. Let's hike to several High Peaks in Maine together!!
The mountains which I highlighted in red are listed in NE 4K footers and in blue are listed as NE HH (New England 100 Highest).

This is cross posted event from my own hiking meetup - Hike/Snowshoe Vermont Meetup.





This is Day-1 hiking event description to peakbag 3 particular mountains, The Horns(3805 ft), West Peak (4145 ft) and Avery Peak (4086 ft) in Bigelow Range in Stratton, Maine. Bigelow Range provides us magnificent outlook with strenuous but fun ridge hike.
You can join us only one of my hiking events or all which is up to you.

Hiking Plan:

1) This is loop hike which doesn't require car spot.
We'll meet at the parking lot of Horns Pond Trail trailhead on Stratton Brook Rd at 7:00AM.

2) We'll start hike at 7:15AM sharp. First, we take Horns Pond Trail(=Fire Warden's Tr) 1.6 miles, then, reach to the trail junction which Horns Pond Tr and Fire Warden's Tr are diverged. (Book Time 1 Hr 10min)

3) Continue to take Horns Pond Tr about 2.5 mi. to reach AT. We'll take AT East and we'll pass southern shore of beautiful Horns Pond and get to Horns Pond lean-tos with 0.1 mi. (Book Time 3 Hr)
The Fire Warden's Tr is the shortest approach to the main peaks of the Bigelow Range, but the Horns Pond Tr is less steep and more interesting. (I hope! )

4) With our ridge hike, we peakbag South Horn summit (5.9 mi), West Peak summit (8.0 mi) and reach to Avery Lean-to and Fire Warden's Tr junction (8.4 mi) (Book Time 5 Hr 15 min) and Avery Peak (8.8 mi) (Book Time 5 Hr 35 min)

5) We'll go back AT about 0.4 mi toward West, take Fire Warden's Tr for 4.6 mi to hike out to the parking lot. (Book Time 7 Hr 30 min)




Hiking Level:
Moderate
Hiking Distance: 12.4 miles for round trip
Hiking Pace: Slow to Moderate
Hiking Hours: 7.5 hours + Lunch 30min + Break Time (Of course, hiking hours varies depending on your hiking pace)



Suggested Meetup Locations:

1) We'll meet at the parking lot of Horns Pond Trail trailhead on Stratton Brook Rd, Kingfield, ME at 7:00AM. This is dirt road, but it's usually passable which runs east from ME 27 about 3.2 mi northwest of the Sugarloaf ski area access road & 4.5 mi southeast of Stratton.

2) I booked Stratton Motel to stay 9/8 night. This is about 20 min away from the trailhead. We can possibly meet there at 6:40AM.

Stratton Motel
162 Main St, Stratton ME 04982
207-246-4171

Another location to stay:
Main Roadhouse
910 Rangeley Rd
Stratton, ME

Other nearby locations to stay overnight:
Stratton Motel http://www.thestratto...


This is google map from Maine Roadhouse to the trialhead.



If you have any questions, please feel free to drop me an email.

Event Organizer,
Tomoko Nakajima
item.name: Multiple Day-Hiking Events in Maine - Day 1: Bigelow Range Hike
